ygData.subject: Song and instrument questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Some things have come up that confuse me regarding songs and their associated instruments. I thought Charismatic Carillon was singing only. Why do you play it
ygData.messageBody:
Some things have come up that confuse me regarding songs and their
associated instruments.

I thought Charismatic Carillon was singing only. Why do you play it
with a flute? I thought our first flute song was the Aquatic Ayre.

I thought Chords of Dissonance was a string song. Why was someone
playing it with a horn? Could you have meant Denon's Discord?

That's all. I just wanted to sort some things out.

Mandibal
Below Average Chef
Very Bad Tailor
Recently Shiny Bard
Cazic-Thule
